author: Reuters Editorial
description: U.S. President Donald Trump told South Korea's presidential envoy that Washington was willing to resolve the North Korean nuclear crisis through engagement under the right conditions, South Korea's Yonhap News Agency reported on Thursday.
title: Trump willing to use engagement on North Korea crisis: South Korea envoy

author: Christine Kim
description: South Korea said on Wednesday it wanted to reopen communications with North Korea as new President Moon Jae-in seeks a two-track policy involving sanctions and dialogue with its reclusive neighbor to rein in its nuclear and missile programs.
title: South Korea says it wants to reopen communications with North amid missile crisis

author: John Hayward
description: On Wednesday, South Korean President Moon Jae-in said “there is a high possibility of a military conflict” with North Korea.
title: South Korean President Moon: ‘High Possibility’ of Military Conflict with North Korea - Breitbart

author: Samuel Osborne
description: South Korean President Moon Jae-in has said there is a "high possibility" of war with North Korea, as he warned its recent missile launch is a serious threat to global peace. "The reality is that there is a high possibility of a military conflict at the NLL (Northern Limit Line) and military demarcation line," Moon was quoted as saying by the presidential Blue House.
title: High possibility of war with North Korea, new South Korean president says

author: Christine Kim and Tom Miles
description: North Korea's missile program is progressing faster than expected, South Korea's defense minister said on Tuesday, after the UN Security Council demanded the North halt all nuclear and ballistic missile tests and condemned Sunday's test-launch.
title: North Korea missile detected by THAAD, program progressing faster than expected: South

author:
Aaron West                    

                                    
                        @ayyy_west
description: These are the matches to keep an eye out for from South Korea.
title: The 9 must-watch matches of the U-20 World Cup | FOX Sports

author: BBC News
description: Kim Jong-un was said to be at the launch but South Korea says it hasn't verified the claims.
title: North Korea claims to have tested 'new rocket'

description: A South Korean government minister says North Korea's missile program is progressing faster than expected.
title: North Korea missile program progressing faster than expected: Seoul

author: YOUKYUNG LEE
description: SEOUL, South Korea (AP) — Cybersecurity experts are pointing to circumstantial evidence that North Korea may be behind the global "ransomware" attack: the way the hackers took hostage computers and servers across the world was similar to previous cyberattacks attributed to North Korea. Simon Choi, a director at South Korean anti-virus software company Hauri Inc. who has analyzed North Korean malware since 2008 and advises the government, said Tuesday that the North is no newcomer to the world of bitcoins. It has been mining the digital currency using malicious computer programs since as early as 2013, he said.
title: Experts see possible North Korea links to global cyberattack

description: A rap group backed by China’s government is warning South Korea in a music video that “you’re going too far” with the deployment of a U.S. missile defense system, as Beijing seeks to bring its state-supported cultural forces to bear in the international dispute.
title: China rappers to Seoul: 'Big brother' opposes missile shield
